goals__remit:
Česká telekomunikační infrastruktura a.s. owns and operates Czech Republic's largest fixed and mobile communications infrastructure.  We provide a wide range of national and international wholesale electronic communications services for other operators and retail service providers.     
 
CETIN was established on 1 June 2015 following the voluntary separation of the former incumbent O2 Czech Republic a.s..
